DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare response rate prostate cancer patient take chemotherapy plus enzastaurin versus chemotherapy plus placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study With Enzastaurin Plus Chemotherapy Placebo Plus Chemotherapy Prostate Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: You least 18 year old . You live close enough doctor 's office attend require visit . You treat chemotherapy prostate cancer . Your organ must function properly . You unable swallow pill . You another serious illness besides prostate cancer . You take another experimental drug within last 30 day . You serious heart condition . You receive another anticancer therapy .
